name: Petit Eva: Evangelion@Game
overview: Fans of Evangelion, you will appreciate Little Eva. Indeed, the title is more of a parody than a reference to the famous manga. Find Ayanami, Pen-Pen, Shinji and the others in kid mode. You will be able to spend your time playing series-themed mini-games. But rest assured the story will take place during school periods and at the NERV, enough to suggest incredible scenes.
